comment/reply:
I know it's supposed to be more medicinal or whatever, but I mean... am I supposed to notice any effects from it? Because I honestly cannot notice any discernible effects from it whatsoever, like... none. I don't feel more soothed, more calm, more revitalized, more mentally collected, no nothing.

I haven't been able to notice anything, and I don't know what I'm supposed to be able to notice from it. I mean, maybe it has to do with the fact that I'm literally schizo, but when I ask people, I haven't really heard a clear answer from them either.
